constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 126 (Thursday, July 28, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DONALDS:
H.R. 8562.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8
[Page H7406]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Defense Production Oversight Act of 2022
